issue.title: [C++][Python] Enable C++ S3FileSystem in macOS wheel builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While the manylinux Python wheels were updated as of version 1.0.0 to include the new C++ S3FileSystem, the wheels built for macOS still do not have this feature included.
